channel.title: BTR: The Omega Hour | Blog Talk Radio
channel.description: The Omega Hour is hosted by Minister Dante Fortson. Every week we will bring you a great show from 8pm - 10pm PST. The topics we cover include but are not limited to Angels, Demons, Aliens, UFOs, Ghosts, Supernatural, Religion, and Politics. Make sure you tune and and bring friends. For more information on Minister Dante Fortson please visit www.MinisterFortson.com

item.description:

item.title: Nephilim Mothers - Modern Nephilim - The Evidence - Jan 14,2011
item.description:
Some people say that this is all an illusion/delusion. Those same people say that the witnesses are the evidence, so this week we will be talking to a witness(es) that will testify that the hybrid program is very real. Doug Riggs joins us with at least one woman that claims to have been an unwilling participant in the hybrid breeding program. Let's end the deception that is being taught about angels pretending to make hybrids. Either the witnesses are the evidence or they are not. This show is guaranteed to be huge.

item.title: Crossover, MYNISTA, Kryst Lyke, and Destiny Lab - Hip Hop Ministry - Dec 03,2010
item.description:
Hip Hop has become one of the biggest industries around. Blacks, whites, Asians, and everyone in between are affected by Hip Hop in some way. Tune in as I talk to four Hip Hop artists that use the Gospel to reach souls for Christ. I'm joined by J-Rich (co-host), as we attempt to explore these up and coming ministries.

Our special guest this week will be Andrionna, author of "In Laws From Hell". Each week we will bring you a great show and special guest, so don't miss a minute. Bring a friend and enjoy the program.

In Laws From Hell | Andrionna | Politics | Current Events | Jesus

item.title: The Omega Hour: Guy Malone - Angels, Aliens, and Demons - Feb 12,2010
item.description:
This week Minister Dante Fortson and Brother Benny "BJ" Jacobs will be talking to special guest Guy Malone, author, website host, and leading voice in UFO/Alien phenomena from a Christian perspective.

ufo | alien | israel | bible | Guy malone
